# 作者简介 {#author .unnumbered}

上不了厅堂，下得了厨房。敲得了代码，逮得住蟑螂。

#导入包

```{r}
library(pacman)
p_load(reader,
       readxl,
       openxlsx,
       tidyverse,
       dplyr,
       tidyr,
       ggplot2,
       ggthemes,
       ggsci,
       ggprism,
       patchwork
)
```

#读取数据

```{r echo=FALSE}
lm <- read.xlsx("~/desktop/AA.xlsx")
str(lm) #解构数据集
```

```{r}
  ggplot(data=lm)+ 
  aes(x=BP,y=Shot)+
  geom_point()+
  facet_wrap(~Team)+
  stat_smooth(method = 'loess', color = 'red')+
  #coord_fixed()+
  #scale_color_nejm() +
  theme_classic() +

  labs(title = "picture")

```
